# pygong

A simple public library for Python program development.

# Usage

## Compile & Install

Ensure that wheel/twine is the latest version.

runnning build.bat/build.sh.

```shell

python -m build

pip install xxx.whl
```

## Direct installation

```shell
pip install pygong
```
